description: Suzi Abramson-Johnson So I guess I may need to grow up and and learn some things. Drove up to our new (old) house in Prescott for the weekend, no power! No candles and one little flashlight.  First freaked out, had Phil check fuses, it was more of a brown out, then total darkness.  Tried to call APS, on hold too long.  Got a glass of wine and sat on the deck. Very peaceful and quiet.  Neighbors offered candles but we were ok. Went online on phone as saw there was an outage. Power back on but I now realized that I need to be better equipped and learn where things are in case I'm alone next time.  And learn not to freak out! Suzi Abramson-Johnson
